text: Porfirio Méndez was a middle-distance runner from Paraguay. Méndez competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics. He was born on 18 April 1966 and died on 24 January 2017.Porfirio Méndez == References == Category:1966 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Paraguayan people Category:Middle-distance runners Category:Olympians
title: Porfirio Méndez
